name: Mission: The Last One
description:
You have two objectives. Get to the bottom and get you score as high as possible.

Use the left and right arrow keys or A/D to dodge the missiles.
Increase your score by passing close to the missiles.

This game was made for the raylib-5k-gamejam

And credit where credits do:

- Player sprite from https://opengameart.org/content/gentleman-spy-animated
- Sprite for random man https://opengameart.org/content/classic-hero
- Explosion sound from https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-0
- Explotion sprite from https://opengameart.org/content/simple-explosion
- Backgound music from Nicole Marie T https://opengameart.org/content/spy-16bit-8bit-chiptune-retro-style-song-for-you...
- LOGO font https://www.ffonts.net/Spy-Agency.font.download
